creator: post@peter-jacobsen.de
text:
Hello,
I added a Futura TrueType font to the Windows 2000 SP4 font list and Batik
renders the font almost unreadable. I am using Batik 1.5 (tried 1.5.1 RC2 with
same result). The Adobe SVG Plugin as well as Batik 1.1.1 render the page fine,
so the assumption is, that something is wrong with Batik 1.5. I cannot downgrade
to Batik 1.1.1 due to the many bugfixes in 1.5 concerning memory leaks. If it
helps, I can provide an HTML link with the problematic SVG page and the Futura
TrueType fonts (we have to be careful with the copyright, though).

Regards,
Peter Jacobsen

creator: deweese@apache.org
text:
You should be able to get the same rendering as before by
using 'text-rendering="geometricPrecision"'.  If this works
for you please close the bug.
